subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Without a true point guard, Boston is moving the ball better than the Knicks are, and the Celtics were also helped in Game 5 by the play of Terrence Williams, a former Net.
snippet: Without a true point guard, Boston is moving the ball better than the Knicks are, and the Celtics were also helped in Game 5 by the play of Terrence Williams, a former Net.
